text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Abandoned property" means personal property that is considered abandoned under this title.
"Abandoned property" includes property in the custody of the federal government that is classified as "unclaimed property" under federal law.

text.section: "Banking organization" means any bank, trust company, savings bank, land bank, and any other similar organization engaged in business in the State.
"Business association" means any corporation, joint stock company, business trust, statutory trust, partnership, or any association for business purposes of two or more individuals.
"Federal government" includes any of its agencies or instrumentalities.
"Financial organization" means any savings and loan association or credit union engaged in business in the State.

"Holder" means any person who is:
In possession of property subject to this title belonging to another;
A trustee, in the case of a trust; or
Indebted to another on an obligation subject to this title.

"Insurance corporation" means any association or corporation transacting in the State the business of insurance on the lives of persons or insurance pertaining to life insurance, including endowments and annuities, disability, accident and health insurance, and property, casualty, and surety insurance, as these terms are defined in the Insurance Article.

"Person" includes the State, any county, municipal corporation, or other political subdivision of the State, or any of their units, an individual, business association, corporation, business trust, statutory trust, estate, trust, partnership, association, two or more persons having a joint or common interest, or any other legal or commercial entity.
"Service charge" means any type of deduction or charge made by a holder on property presumed abandoned under this title.

"Utility" means any person who owns or operates in the State, for public use, any plant, equipment, property, franchise, or license for the transmission of communications, for the production, storage, transmission, sale, delivery, or furnishing of electricity, water, steam, or gas, or for the transportation of persons or property.
